dataaccess

Class UsersDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • dataaccess.UsersDB

  • public class UsersDB
extends java.lang.Object
    UsersDB.java is the Data Access class used to retrieve, create, update and delete user entities from the database.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UsersDB() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void delete(Users user)
      This void method deletes an existing user entity in the database.
      Users get(int id)
      This method retrieves a single user from the database, using the CUser ID.
      java.util.List<Users> getAll()
      This method retrieves a list of all the users.
      java.util.List<Users> getAllByWorkCenter(java.lang.String workCenterId)
      This method retrieves a list of all the users that belong to a work center
      void insert(Users user)
      This void method performs an insertion of a new user entity in the database.
      void update(Users user)
      This void method performs an update on an existing user entity in the database.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public Users get(int id)
        This method retrieves a single user from the database, using the CUser ID.
        Parameters:
        id - - ID of user to be retrieved
        Returns:
        User - a user by their id.

      • getAll

        public java.util.List<Users> getAll()
        This method retrieves a list of all the users.
        Returns:
        A list of Users - a list of all users in the database

      • getAllByWorkCenter

        public java.util.List<Users> getAllByWorkCenter(java.lang.String workCenterId)
        This method retrieves a list of all the users that belong to a work center
        Parameters:
        workCenterId - - Work center ID.
        Returns:
        A list of Users - a list of all users from a work center

      • insert

        public void insert(Users user)
        This void method performs an insertion of a new user entity in the database.
        Parameters:
        user - The User object to insert into the DB

      • delete

        public void delete(Users user)
        This void method deletes an existing user entity in the database.
        Parameters:
        user - - User object.

      • update

        public void update(Users user)
        This void method performs an update on an existing user entity in the database.
        Parameters:
        user - - User object being updated
